description: Try our easy to follow Overnight Oats With Bananas, Blueberries & Raspberries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Overnight Oats With Bananas, Blueberries & Raspberries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Tamar Valley Dairy Greek Style Yoghurt Vanilla Bean

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, stir The Creamery Vanilla Bean and milk together until well combined and lump free.
Add the oats to the wet mix and stir together. Cover and transfer to the fridge overnight.
Serve: divide the overnight oat mix to 4 bowls and top with bananas, blueberries and raspberries.
